question: 0a. Packet code
response_labels: I, Initial Visit Packet | F, Follow-up Visit Packet
comments: See bottom of current form; use integer portion of version number

question: 0b. Form version number
comments: Use your Center ID. Valid codes are available here: https://naccdata.org/center-ids

question: 0c. ADRC ID
comments: Follow your Center’s Patient ID scheme; use same ID as in MDS, if participant is enrolled in MDS.

question: 0d. PTID
conformity: String with max length of 10 characters

question: 0e. UDSv3 Visit date
comments: This must be the same as the UDSv3 visit date (i.e., Form A1 form date)

question: 0f. B1a Blood Pressure Addendum - Form date
0g. B1a Blood Pressure Addendum - Examiner's initials
0h. ADRC Visit Number
comments: Can be determined by Center. The Center may use its existing visit number scheme. It is not required to start with 1.

question: 1a1. Subject blood pressure (sitting; average of two readings), systolic, left arm
response_labels: 70-230 = systolic blood pressure, 888 = unknown or not assessed

question: 1b1. Subject blood pressure (sitting; average of two readings), systolic, right arm
response_labels: 70-230 = systolic blood pressure, 888 = unknown or not assessed

question: 1a2. Subject blood pressure (sitting; average of two readings), diastolic, left arm
response_labels: 30-140 = diastolic blood pressure, 888 = unknown or not assessed

question: 1b2. Subject blood pressure (sitting; average of two readings), diastolic, right arm
response_labels: 30-140 = diastolic blood pressure, 888 = unknown or not assessed

question: 2. Blood pressure measured by approved device
